metadata.title: CVE-2024-41055 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mm: prevent derefencing NULL ptr in pfn_section_valid()Commit 5ec8e8ea8b77 ("mm/sparsemem: fix race in accessingmemory_section->usage") changed pfn_section_valid() to add a READ_ONCE()call around "ms->usage" to fix a race with section_deactivate() wherems->usage can be cleared.  The READ_ONCE() call, by itself, is not enoughto prevent NULL pointer dereference.  We need to check its value beforedereferencing it.
